mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_ID AS roomId, ROOM_RANK_CODE AS roomRankCode, ROOM_RANK_NAME AS roomRankName, ROOM_SIZE AS roomSize, ROOM_BASIC_CAPACITY AS roomBasicCapacity, ROOM_MAX_CAPACITY AS roomMaxCapacity, ROOM_BASIC_PRICE AS roomBasicPrice, VIEW_CODE AS viewCode, VIEW_NAME AS viewName, ROOM_ADD_PRICE AS roomAddPrice, BED_CODE AS bedCode, BED_NAME AS bedName, BED_CNT AS bedCnt, DELETE_STATUS AS deleteStatus FROM ( SELECT R.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY R.ROOM_RANK_CODE, R.VIEW_CODE, R.BED_CODE ORDER BY R.ROOM_ID) AS rn FROM ROOM R WHERE R.ROOM_ID NOT IN ( SELECT RR.ROOM_ID FROM ROOM_RESERVATION RR WHERE (RR.CHECKIN < TO_DATE(#{ckoutDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RR.CHECKOUT > TO_DATE(#{ckinDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) OR (RR.CHECKIN <= TO_DATE(#{ckinDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RR.CHECKOUT >= TO_DATE(#{ckoutDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ) ) Subquery WHERE rn = 1

select MEMBER_ID memberId, EMAIL email, NAME name, GENDER gender, ENG_LNAME engLname, ENG_FNAME engFname, ZIPCODE zipcode, PHONE phone, ADDRESS address, to_char(BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-MM-dd') birthday, ADDR_DETAIL addrDetail , to_char(SIGNUP_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') signupDate, SUBSTR(NATIONAL_CODE,4) nationalCode from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID =#{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_RESERVATION (PAY_NUM, USER_ID, ROOM_ID, ROOM_RES_STATUS, CHECKIN, CHECKOUT, ROOM_RES_DATE, ADULTS_NUM, KIDS_NUM, GUEST_PHONE, GUEST_EMAIL, GUEST_BIRTHDAY, GUEST_REQUEST, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{payNum}, #{userId}, #{roomId}, #{roomResStatus}, TO_DATE(#{ckinDate}||'15:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{ckoutDate}||'10:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SYSDATE, #{adultsNum}, #{kidsNum}, #{guestPhone}, #{guestEmail}, #{guestBirthday}, #{guestRequest}, SYSDATE)
